message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 40, but I'm worth more, so I get 60!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still worth more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still the one who's worth more!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still not giving up yet!
I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I'm not sure how much longer I can hold out!
